column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=After going to the gym , I knew I needed to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I went to the bathroom and turned the faucet on in the tub while plugging the drain to fill it .
#id=3
#text=When the water was at a good level I shut the water off .
#id=4
#text=I took off all my dirty gym clothes .
#id=5
#text=I then made sure the temperature of the water was nice and warm before I slowly got inside .
#id=6
#text=I soaked in the water for a little while before I grabbed a bar of soap and scrubbed and cleaned my body with it .
#id=7
#text=I also used some shampoo to clean my hair .
#id=8
#text=After dipping into the water to rinse all the shampoo and soap off my body , I unplugged the drain and emptied the water from the tub .
#id=9
#text=I got out and dried myself with a towel .
#text=It sure made me feel a lot better to be clean after a workout .
